modShortDescription: This mod multiplies the damage done to heads by way too much, should kill everything in one headshot.
modDescription:
This mod multiplies the damage done to heads by way too much, should kill everything in one headshot.

This effect is given to every [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/)/bullet that specifies entity-damage, therefor this mod will work with items added through different mods (like Darkness Falls, although added Zâ€™s might not have a head-section specified).

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hqZGGIBRQVsGRWTiy6irIw6hI4VNHdCw/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23566-lethal-headshots-all-headshots-kill-a193-tested/).

**Credits:** [Fixation](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/fixation/)
